articles.title: With Ukraine war, Europe's geopolitical map is moving again - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: BRUSSELS (AP) — Even though Russia has lost influence and friends since the collapse of the Soviet empire in 1989, the nuclear superpower still holds sway over several of its neighbors in Europe and keeps others in an uneasy neutrality.
